history.proof: induction ts. - unfold Formula. qsimpl use: Tnil,LT,atomic. - unfold Formula. qsimpl use: var,Tcons,atomic,LT,Tnil.

exceptions.exn: The term "LT" has type "LNNRelation" while it is expected to have type "Language".
In environment n : nat t : fol.Term LNN ts : fol.Terms LNN n IHts : Formula The term "LT" has type "LNNRelation" while it is expected to have type "Language".

original: induction ts. - unfold Formula. apply (atomic LT (Tnil 0)). - unfold Formula. apply (atomic LT (Tcons 1 (var 0) (Tnil 0))).
